title: Three bedroom is ready in the Feltonville
description:

Upstairs you have three bedrooms with the appropriate closet spacing for each room and a full bathroom. We definitely can’t forget the finished basement with the full bathroom! Popular shopping center such as Adams Plaza is only a 5-10 min drive which you will find popular restaurants and stores such as Walmart, Home Depot, Chic Fil A, IHOP, Pep Boys and so much more. title: Unbelievable 4 Bedroom Loft in Old City. 3500+ SqFt
description:
An incredible opportunity to live in one of the most historic, bustling and prominent locations in the entire city! An incredible one of a kind loft apartment that spans over 3500 square feet. Enter up the wide staircase to the second floor into your massive living room featuring hardwood floors, exposed duct work for your central air and heat, tall ceilings and ceiling fans.
Down the hallway you will find the first of four bedrooms featuring a large skylight, ceiling fan and a nice size reach-in closet. Next you'll find your spacious first full bath featuring a single vanity and a stand up shower stall. The next bedroom is even larger and features a larger reach-in closet. Further down the hall you will find a very bright den with a large skylight perfect for a reading room or an office.
Next down the hall is yet an even larger bedroom with tall ceilings, a ceiling fan, and a massive walk-in closet. Further down the hall is a another equally large bedroom and another massive walk-in closet. Lastly towards the back of the apartment you will find an incredibly large space for dining, kitchen as well as entertainment.
The kitchen features a gas stove and a dishwasher. Tucked in the corner you will find your laundry room, as well as an additional full bath with a tub and single vanity and a linen closet.
Located in the heart of all the action Old City has to offer, it doesn't get much better than this! Tenant is also responsible for $100 monthly for water.
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Philly

The large double closet is big enough to hide a full dresser. Kitchenette includes full size fridge, 2 burner cooktop, and microwave, as well as ample cabinet space. Bathroom boasts newer fixtures as well as a large 48" shower stall. Entryway includes a 2nd closet for coats and shoes. Room overlooks view of the spacious and tree-filled backyard.

title: Spacious 1 Bed Loft in Northern Liberties with Parking
description:
Beautifully renovated industrial-chic condo for rent in the heart of Northern Liberties, with parking! This bi-level condo sits on the 2nd floor at the rear of the building, tucked away from the bustle of the street. This awesome space includes a living area, an eat-in kitchen, a dining or office area, and a lofted bedroom, boasting new flooring and 2 brand new bathrooms. Plus, enjoy the convenience of your own deeded parking spot!
Enter the building and walk down the covered corridor to find a cafe table outside of your unit, where you can sit and enjoy some fresh air with your coffee, rain or shine. Inside you’ll find a double height living room that has space to host 2 sitting areas, a media console and a bar or reading nook, depending on your preference. Make your way back past the newly renovated half bathroom and through the eat-in-kitchen, which is complete with an electric stove, microwave, dishwasher, and laundry.
You’ll then find another quaint, but double height seating area, anchored by an exposed brick wall and oversized windows. Use this area as your home office or whatever else you can imagine. Finally the floating stairs will lead you to the lofted bedroom and a brand new, freshly renovated full bathroom. You’ll find plenty of storage space with closets throughout the unit and a 6x8 storage unit in the basement.
Additional perks include central air and shared outdoor space. Enjoy living in one of Philly’s most popular and lively neighborhoods, welcoming to lifestyles of all kinds. Northern Liberties is home to a vibrant art scene, an abundance of great restaurants and cool shops, and some of Philly’s best night life.
Listing provided by Keller Williams Main Line

description:

Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!

landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

description:
Amazing home for Rent in Graduate Hospital with 1 CAR PARKING in the back of the home! This home features hardwood floors throughout, 3 large bedrooms, 2 full baths, a powder room on the main level, and a partially finished basement with a separate storage room.
Enter into a light-filled living room that flows into your dining and eat-in kitchen area with granite countertops and island. Head out the back door to your PARKING area. The 2nd floor has 2 generously sized bedrooms with a full bathroom and a separate laundry room.
The 3rd-floor private suite features pocket doors, and an oversized 4 piece bathroom with a jacuzzi tub. Enjoy your private deck overlooking the city's skyline. Need more space? Make your way down to the finished basement area to entertain or watch a movie and unwind. There is also a separate storage room and closet for all of your holiday decorations and extras. Tenant pays all utilities: Gas, electric, water, and cable/internet.
No Pets Allowed.

description: This apartment was recently renovated to create an open floor plan with extra tall ceilings. The primary bedroom is large with two closets and three windows. title: Welcome to this highly desired one level living Ranch townhouse.
description:
Welcome to this highly desired one level living Ranch townhouse with a huge finished basement located in the Highlands in New Britain Township and the highly rated Central Bucks School District. Step inside and you will notice the bright open floor plan featuring neutral paint throughout and hardwood floors running from the foyer into the dining room and the spacious great room featuring vaulted ceiling and tons of windows to let the sunlight spill in, also featuring built in bookshelves. A formal dining room is also just off the foyer and is adjacent to the eat in kitchen. The kitchen features an abundance of cabinets and counter space, newer stainless steel appliances and a cozy breakfast area which features a sliding door leading you out to the maintenance free deck and private yard. The master bedroom is spacious with vaulted ceiling offering a perfect retreat at the end of a long day featuring a well appointed master bathroom and huge walk in closet. Two additional nice size bedrooms offer large closets and share the hall bathroom. A large utility closet could house the washer and dryer if desired. Downstairs the huge basement features a large finished rec room and an additional finished room, perfect for a craft or hobby room. There is still lots of unfinished area which has a large laundry room and offers plenty of storage or room for further finished area. Located just minutes from shopping areas, and the major roadways for easy commuting. Parking is assigned an also has plenty of overflow spaces.

title: Charming, Renovated Fitler Square Home with Backyard
description:
This charming, updated 1880’s rowhouse is located in the heart of the beautiful Fitler Square neighborhood. 2215 Naudain offers the convenience of being a stone’s throw from the neighborhood’s best cafes, restaurants, schools, and shopping (Rival Bros Coffee, Cafe Lutecia, GIANT Heirloom, South Square Market, CVS, Illata, Wawa, The Philadelphia School, The Goddard School, Greenfield Elementary, etc.), while being situated on a quiet, tree-lined street. This 2-story home consists of 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, spacious living and dining rooms with high ceilings, and has been lovingly restored while retaining its original charm. The fully-renovated kitchen features marble countertops, Bosch and Kitchenaid appliances, pot filler, ample storage/pantry space, and a beautifully sculpted range hood. Upstairs you will find the three bedrooms, plenty of natural light, and the brand new bathroom with Kohler fixtures, full tub/shower, and classic subway and marble tile. The backyard is perfect for warm summer nights, gardening, and grilling, with direct access to Naudain Street via the side corridor.
The home retains its historic character with original wood flooring, molding, and doors throughout, but also features comfortable upgrades like central heating and air conditioning, new light fixtures, new double-paned windows, custom shutters, and Nest doorbell/camera. The unfinished basement is clean and dry, and offers washer, dryer, freezer, and plenty of space for storage.
Convenient location walking distance to parks, schools, universities, hospitals, and employers including Fitler Square, Schuylkill River Park, The Goddard School, The Philadelphia School, Greenfield Elementary, UPenn, Penn Medicine, HUP, CHOP, VA Hospital, PennVet, Robert’s Center for Pediatric Research, Aramark, and PECO.
Available as soon as June 1st. Pets will be considered with a pet deposit and or pet rent. Tenant(s) to pay for water, electricity, gas, and Internet/cable. First month’s rent and security deposit due upon lease signing.
